test.name: Test Open Home Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 1000) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${hidden_content} = Reasoning in inconsistent prioritized knowledge bases: an argumentative approach ( L. Ho, S. Arch-int, N. Arch-int), International Journal of Electrical and Computer Engineering, 12, 2022. [url] [doi]...
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: L. Ho, S. Arch-int, N. Arch-int
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
